SELECT SEQ_ART.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ART (ID, ART_TITLE, ART_CATEGORY, ART_MATERIAL, ART_SIZE, ART_DESCRIPTION, ART_END_DATE, USER_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{artTitle}, #{artCategory}, #{artMaterial}, #{artSize}, #{artDescription}, #{artEndDate}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBA.ID, ART_TITLE, ART_CATEGORY, ART_MATERIAL, ART_SIZE, ART_DESCRIPTION, ART_END_DATE, ART_STATUS, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBU.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TAI ON TAI.ART_ID = TBA.ID WHERE ART_STATUS = '미신청' ORDER BY ART_END_DATE DESC

SELECT TBA.ID, ART_TITLE, ART_CATEGORY, ART_MATERIAL, ART_SIZE, ART_DESCRIPTION, ART_END_DATE, ART_STATUS, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBU.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TAI ON TAI.ART_ID = TBA.ID WHERE TBA.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ART_LIKE (ID, USER_ID, ART_ID, ART_LIKE_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_ART_LIKE.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{artId}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_ART_LIKE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ART_ID = #{artId}
